import React from 'react' import { CBadge, CDropdown, CDropdownItem, CDropdownMenu, CDropdownToggle, CImg } from '@coreui/react' import CIcon from '@coreui/icons-react' import logout from '../utils/auth.js' const TheHeaderDropdown = () => { logoutHandler = () => { logout.logout((status) => { if (status.logged_out) { this.context.router.history.push("/login"); } }); }; return (
Settings Profile Settings Payments 42 Logout ) } export default TheHeaderDropdown
